front.title: Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) Authorization for Network Access Server (NAS) Management

abstract.t: This document describes Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) attributes for the authorization and service provisioning of Network Access Servers (NASes). Both local and remote management are supported, with granular access rights and management privileges. Specific provisions are made for remote management via framed management protocols, and for specification of a protected transport protocol.
